recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara 1
recipes.description: Spaghetti Carbonara is a classic pasta dish that is quick, easy, and delicious. It is a simple dish made with spaghetti, eggs, cheese, and bacon. The eggs and cheese create a creamy sauce that coats the pasta, while the bacon adds a smoky, salty flavor. This recipe is perfect for a quick weeknight dinner or a special occasion.
